item.description:
Pediatrician Alexandre Beck (François Cluzet) still grieves the murder of his beloved wife Margot (Marie-Josée Croze) eight years earlier. When two bodies are found near the scene of the crime, the police reopen the case and Alex becomes a suspect again. The mystery deepens when Alex receives an anonymous e-mail with a link to a video clip that seems to suggest Margot is somehow still alive and a message to "tell no one." Based on Harlan Coben’s international bestselling thriller. Winner of 2007 César Awards for Best Director (Guillaume Canet) and Best Actor.

http://www.tellnoonem...

Leave it to the french to take a Hollywood Action Thriller and turn it into a quality film with well developed characters, excellent cinematograpy and just a whole lot of fun.

This film screened at the MFA to sell out crowds and great reviews from the Meetup Group.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be holding up a Meetup Sign much to the wonderment of all
item.name: Tell No One
